name: Villain Vegan
description:
It's Halloween, and the restaurant you deliver for, Villain Vegan, just had their delivery app crash. The food's all ready, but it's on you to get everyone's order, and then deliver it to them!

Good thing you're Jumpin' Jack himself: Walk, jump, climb, bunnyjump, and bombjump your way around town with your special pumpkin bombs:

Finish off your deliveries for the night, then get to the Halloween Party!

Featuring a kooky cast of 35+ castouts and weirdoes, with 330+ lines of dialogue!



Happy Halloween! Enjoy this... Sludge-Life-Like? Fall-themed Rocket Jump Simulator? Whatever you call it, this game can take anywhere from 20 minutes to 2 hours. Soak in the fall feeling.
